name: Dad
wishText: Thank you for everything you've done for me and everything you have given me
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! BEst dad in the world, blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now its time for your presents!
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
